content:
Ambrose Burnside replacing McClellan
	he was eager to prove he was not Tardy George
mcclellan was playing the game slooow and methodical
Burnside wanted to flip the switch

at Fredericksburg, Confeds had huge setups
usually union see it and immediately runaway
Burnside was like "naw dawg we finna take dis" and he did
he utterly FAILED rip sadge
